title: ‘Body and Soul’ Review: Careening Choreography
sub_head: The Jacob’s Pillow Dance Festival returns with in-person and digital programming, including this lengthy 2019 performance by Crystal Pite and the Paris Opera Ballet.
body: This year’s Jacob’s Pillow Dance Festival runs through Aug. 29 for on-site events and Sept. 23 for virtual ones. The opening week began with the festival’s first live, in-person performances since 2019. That offering, from June 30 through July 4, featured tap dancer and choreographer Michelle Dorrance heading her widely acclaimed Dorrance Dance in roving site-specific appearances around the rustic Pillow campus, located in Becket, Mass.
